:::: Valiant Hearts The Great War 2014 MULTI10 Steam-Rip ::::


::Information::


Released: June 26, 2014 
Genre: Adventure 
Developer: Ubisoft Montpellier 
Publisher: Ubisoft 
Platform: PC 
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip] 
Language: English / Russian / German / French / Italian / Spanish / Dutch / Japanese / Brazilian / Portuguese 
Language: English / Russian / German / French / Italian / Spanish / Dutch / Japanese / Brazilian / Portuguese 
Tablet: PRESENT [Ali213]


::Description::


This is a story about fate and closely interwoven unrequited love in war-torn world. Accompanied by his faithful dog, heroes trying to survive in transheyah.


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows XP SP3 or Windows Vista SP2 or Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8 (both 32/64bit versions) 
Processor: Intel Pentium IV 630 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Athlon64 3000 + @ 1.8 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or AMD Radeon HD2900 XT (512MB VRAM) 
DirectX: Version 9.0 
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers 
Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, optional Microsoft XBOX360 controller or compatible


::Installation Steps::


1) Download the torrent.
2) Install the game Via Setup.
3) Copy the No-DVD all Contents in main game.
4) Play.


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT Goes to Ali213 for Source and Velldanas for Distribution.
